TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ECDsa extends System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm
Public MustInherit Class ECDsa Inherits AsymmetricAlgorithm

summary.span: 提供抽象基底類別，這個類別封裝 Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA)。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class that encapsulates the Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別可做為抽象的基底類別，如衍生。This class serves as the abstract base class for derivations.

MemberSignature.Value: protected ECDsa ();
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: ECDsa();

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會呼叫衍生自類別類別。This constructor is called by classes that derive from the class. 類別是目前支援的唯一實作[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。The class is the only implementation currently supported by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 您可以提供您自己的自訂實作。You may provide your own custom implementation.

summary.span: 建立 Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA) 實作的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of an implementation of the Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA).

returns.span: 這個類別之預設實作 () 的新執行個體。

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsa Create (string algorithm);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsa Create(string algorithm) cil managed

param.name: algorithm
param.span: ECDSA 實作的名稱。

span.span: The name of an ECDSA implementation.

param.span: 下列字串全部參考相同的實作，也就是 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中目前支援的唯一實作。

span.span: The following strings all refer to the same implementation, which is the only implementation currently supported in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]:

param.span: \- "ECDsa"

span.span: \- "ECDsa"

param.span: \- "ECDsaCng"

span.span: \- "ECDsaCng"

param.span: \- "System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsaCng"

span.span: \- "System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsaCng"

param.span: 您也可以提供自訂 ECDSA 實作的名稱。

span.span: You can also provide the name of a custom ECDSA implementation.

summary.span: 建立 Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA) 指定實作的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the specified implementation of the Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA).

returns.span: 此類別之指定實作的新執行個體。

span.span: A new instance of the specified implementation of this class.

returns.span: 如果指定的演算法名稱未對應至 ECDSA 實作，則這個方法會傳回 。

span.span: If the specified algorithm name does not map to an ECDSA implementation, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您要開發自己實作物件，您可以使用方法多載來建立自訂`algorithm`字串，指定您的實作。If you develop your own implementation of an object, you can use the method overload to create a custom `algorithm` string that specifies your implementation. 如果您指定了自訂值`algorithm`參數，物件會使用它來判斷是否可以建立 ECDSA 物件。If you specify a custom value for the `algorithm` parameter, the object will use it to determine whether an ECDSA object can be created.

span.span: The parameter is .

summary.span: 取得金鑰交換演算法的名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the key exchange algorithm.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性繼承自基底類別。This property is inherited from the base class. Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA) 用於數位簽章產生;它不用於金鑰衍生，因此，這個屬性會傳回`null`。The Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA) is used for digital signature generation; it is not used for key derivation Therefore, this property returns `null`.

summary.span: 驗證數位簽章是否有效。

span.span: Verifies that a digital signature is valid.

abstract member VerifyHash : byte[] * byte[] -> bool

param.name: hash
param.span: 資料區塊的雜湊值。

span.span: The hash value of a block of data.

param.name: signature
param.span: 要驗證的數位簽章。

span.span: The digital signature to be verified.

summary.span: 根據指定的雜湊值來驗證數位簽章。

span.span: Verifies a digital signature against the specified hash value.

returns.span: 如果雜湊值等於解密的簽章，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the hash value equals the decrypted signature; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 簽章是第一次使用的公開金鑰來解密，並與相比較，驗證的雜湊值。The signature is first decrypted by using the public key, and then compared to the hash value for verification.
